inputs.selection_motivation: Euro and US Dollar are the two largest global currencies, directly competing as reserve and transaction currencies; linking them as peers captures their competitive relationship.
inputs.candidate_motivation: The selected topics are closely related to the Euro, either as direct currency pairs, economic indicators, or policies that influence its value and stability.

proposed_link.motivation: Euro and US Dollar are the two largest global currencies, directly competing as reserve and transaction currencies; linking them as peers captures their competitive relationship.
